content: I'm interested in working on type layout, but I can't find any E-easy and/or E-mentor issues that are A-layout. What would be a "good first issue" for type layout?
I'm also interested in codegen, so I'd be interested in a small codegen-related project as well :)
I found #52382 but it seems like it might require a bit more knowledge about layout/codegen that what I have.
I saw that one, but it feels like it might require more knowledge than I have about layout.
